name: MKMapType
desc: The type of map to display.

items.name: case standard
items.desc: A street map that shows the position of all roads and some road names.

items.name: case hybrid
items.desc: A satellite image of the area with road and road name information layered on top.

items.name: case satelliteFlyover
items.desc: A satellite image of the area with flyover data where available.

items.name: case hybridFlyover
items.desc: A hybrid satellite image with flyover data where available.

items.name: case mutedStandard
items.desc: A street map where your data is emphasized over the underlying map details.
